name: PxlPrcl
description:
Find the packages and deliver to the correct recipient. 

Controls:

UP ARROW- Jump

UP ARROW IN AIR- Double Jump

LEFT ARROW- Left

RIGHT ARROW- Right

DOWN ARROW- Jump Down (through platform)

Z- Pick up parcel

X- Drop/Deliver parcel

Made in 3 hours for TriJam #107 (Theme: Package Delivery).

Music and Sound Effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com
